html:
March 23 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - TOWER SALE AGREEMENTS

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - AGREEMENTS TO SELL ITS TELECOMMUNICATIONS TOWER COMPANIES IN MADAGASCAR AND MALAWI TO HELIOS TOWERS PLC

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - AGGREGATE GROSS CONSIDERATION FOR TRANSACTIONS IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $108 MILLION

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - AIRTEL AFRICA'S UNITS WILL CONTINUE TO DEVELOP, MAINTAIN AND OPERATE THEIR EQUIPMENT ON TOWERS UNDER SEPARATE LEASE ARRANGEMENTS

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - TO BUILD TO SUIT COMMITMENTS WITH PURCHASER FOR EXTRA 195 SITES IN MADAGASCAR, MALAWI OVER 3 YRS FOR FURTHER $11 MILLION OF CONSIDERATION

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS FROM DEALS TO BE USED TO REDUCE GROUP EXTERNAL DEBT AND TO INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
